sentence.Network_en: He said they should turn their fire on the Conservative Party instead.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说他们应该掉转枪口，向保守党开火。

sentence.Network_en: The council recently drew fire for its intervention in the dispute.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会最近因为介入该起争端而遭到批评。

sentence.Network_en: The central heating's been turned off. I've turned it on again.
sentence.Network_cn: 中央供暖系统已经关上。我又将它打开了。

auth_sentence.content: He helped me out of some pretty bad fire-fights.
auth_sentence.res_content: He helped me out of some pretty bad fire-fights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He helped me out of some pretty bad fire-fights.

auth_sentence.content: The central bank and the government definitely think so.
auth_sentence.res_content: The central bank and the government definitely think so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The central bank and the government definitely think so.

auth_sentence.content: They did not fire their weapons during the search.
auth_sentence.res_content: They did not fire their weapons during the search.
